Name: Perry Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Pear with a hint of sparkle.
Nutrition: One serving of Perry Cocktail contains 178 calories
